extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite   Level 3 or 4 and CISC 235/3.0 and (MATH 110 or MATH 111 or MATH 112).

basic.description: Introduction to computer graphics, including a review of current hardware; modelling and transformations in two and three dimensions; visual realism: perspective, hidden surface elimination, and shading; colour models; applications in several fields. James Stewart.
basic.subject: CISC
basic.title: Graphics (A)
